amendment.description: To authorize issuance of certificates of documentation authorizing certain vessels to engage in coastwise trade in the carriage of natural gas.

vote.text: Amendment SA 923 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 923 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S7142; text: CR S7142) To authorize issuance of certificates of documentation authorizing certain vessels to engage in coastwise trade in the carriage of natural gas.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 923 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Feinstein.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 923 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
